title: UK box office report, October 25–27: Joker’s reign of chaos continues, but Shaun the Sheep fights back
text:
Joker continues its reign of chaos, but there’s a strong slate just below, writes Charles Gant in his weekly box office bulletin

The immovable object: Joker

During the summer, when blockbuster releases come thick and fast, it’s rare for any single film to enjoy a long, uninterrupted run at the UK box office. Case in point: both Avengers: Endgame and Toy Story 4, which remain the biggest and third-biggest hits of the year (The Lion King is second), spent only two weeks at the chart summit.

With Joker, it’s a different story. The dark drama has ruled the box office for the whole of October, staying at the top spot now for a fourth week in a row. The only other film to achieve four weeks at the...
description: Joker continues its reign of chaos, but there’s a strong slate just below, writes Charles Gant in his weekly box office bulletin
